        the user object, or null if the user does not exist

        DataAccessException - when there is database access failure

                                 throws UserException,
                                        DataAccessException
        Returns all the groups.
        Parameters:

        the groups
        Throws:

      • getUserVOs

        User[] getUserVOs()
           throws UserException,
                  DataAccessException
        Returns all the users in the database. The groups they belong to are loaded in the returned user object.
        Returns:
        Array of UserVO objects
        Throws:
        UserException
        DataAccessException

      • queryUsers

        java.util.List<User> queryUsers(java.lang.String whereCondition,
                                boolean withGroups,
                                int startIndex,
                                int endIndex,
                                java.lang.String sortOn)
                         throws UserException,
                                DataAccessException
        Query for users
        Parameters:
        whereCondition - a SQL expression that will be included after "where". If it is null, no where clause will be used and the query returns all entries in database (pagination is still applicable)
        withGroups - if true, each returned user object will include the list of groups the user is a member of, along with roles within the group
        startIndex - start index for pagination. The first row has index 0 if the value passed in is negative, return all users satisfying the query without pagination
        endIndex - end index for pagination; ignored when startIndex is negative
        sortOn - the column name on which the sorting is performed
        Returns:
        a list of users matching the query
        Throws:
        UserException
        DataAccessException

      • updateUserRole

        void updateUserRole(Role role)
             throws UserException,
                    DataAccessException
        Updates a role. Name and description can be changed.
        Parameters:
        role - content to be updated. The ID field, is used to identify which role to update, and name and description are to be modified.
        Throws:
        UserException
        DataAccessException

      • getEmailAddressesForGroups

                                                            UserException

        Returns:
        list of e-mail addresses

        DataAccessException

                                                      throws DataAccessException,
                                                             UserException
        Returns the set of unique user attributes. Public is defined as those whose attribute name does not contain ':'.

        DataAccessException
        UserException
